items.title: Caterpillar (CAT) Advances But Underperforms Market: Key Facts
items.description: The latest trading day saw Caterpillar (CAT) settling at $341.67, representing a +1.75% change from its previous close.

items.title: US business equipment borrowings down more than 7% y/y in February, ELFA says
items.description: U.S. companies borrowed 7.4% lessto finance equipment investments in February compared with thesame period a year earlier, the Equipment Leasing and FinanceAssociation said on Monday. ...
